sent.orig: The past tense of cook is formed by adding-ed.
The thermal safety of RDX explosive is studied by DSC, TG-DTA, ARC and Cook-off test.
sent.trans: 采用DSC、TG-DTA、ARC及Cook-off实验对RDX炸药的热安全性进行了实验研究。

sent.orig: A good cook could cook as much cookies as a cook who could cook cookies.
sent.trans: 如果一个好厨师能做小甜饼，那么他能做多少个小甜饼呢？

sent.orig: How many cookies could a good cook cook If a good cook could cook cookies?
sent.trans: 一个好厨师能和一个会做小甜饼的好厨师做一样多的小甜饼。

sent.orig: How many cuckoos would a cook cook if a cook could cook cuckoos.
sent.trans: 如果一只鸡想生蛋它将会生出多少蛋来？
